CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_Makeshift
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Makeshift Scope
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A crude optical sight, marginally better than ironsights.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Atttachment_Stock_Makeshift
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Makeshift Stock
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A crude stock made of wire and wood. Lightweight, but not very sturdy.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Accessory_Flashlight
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Flashlight
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A mounted flashlight. Not as useful as night vision in the dark, but better than nothing.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Bayonet_Modern
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Modern Bayonet
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A sharp, steel bayonet. Simple, but effective.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Muzzle_FlashHider
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Flash Hider
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An attachment fitted to the end of the barrel to conceal the muzzle flash, masking the shooter's position when firing in the dark.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Muzzle_Suppressor
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Compensator
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A attachment fitted to the end of the barrel that directs escaping gases to counter muzzle climb from recoil.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Muzzle_Choke
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Choke
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A choke for shotguns, reducing the spread and producing a tighter shot pattern.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_Reflex
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Reflex
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A low-profile reflex sight that provides an unobstructed view for close quarters fighting.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_2xACOG
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: 2x ACOG
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: ACOG scope for engaging targets at medium range.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_4xACOG
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: 4x ACOG
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: ACOG scope for engaging enemies at medium range.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_NVScope
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Night Vision Scope
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A night vision scope, allowing superior targeting in the dark.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Stock_Light
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Folding Stock
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A lightweight stock, reducing the weapon's overall mass at the cost of greater recoil.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Stock_Heavy
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Heavy Stock
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A heavy stock, providing improved controllability at the expense of added weight.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_Bipod
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Bipod
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A bipod, providing a solid firing position at the cost of additional set up time.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_AngleGrip
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Angled Foregrip
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An angled foregrip, providing additional handling speed and control when engaging targets.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_VerticalGrip
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Vertical Foregrip
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A vertical foregrip, providing excellent control over sway and muzzle climb when firing.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_M320GrenadeLauncher
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: 40mm Grenade Launcher
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An underslung grenade launcher capable of firing 40mm grenades, providing enhanced firepower.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_M26Shotgun
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: M26 Shotgun
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A short-barreled, undermounted shotgun. While limited in range, it offers devestating firepower in close quarters.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Bayonet_Spacer
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Spacer
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An advanced bayonet, featuring a mono-molecular cutting edge capable of effortless slicing through thick armor.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_SmartNV
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Hybrid Sight
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An advanced multi-spectrum targetting sight, capable of spotting and tracking targets in any conditions.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Stock_Modern
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Advanced Stock
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An advanced stock with built-in recoil dampeners and gyroscopic compensators, making for exceptional weapon handling characteristics.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Bayonet_Mechanoid
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Scyther Bayonet
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A fearsome bayonet made from the blades of a destroyed Scyther mechanoid.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Optic_LancerScope
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Lancer Scope
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: An advanced scope crafted from the targetting and tracking system of a destroyed Lancer mechanoid.

CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.Name: CE_Attachment_Underbarrel_PikemanLauncher
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.label: Pikeman Grenade Launcher
CombatExtended.AttachmentDef.description: A formidable underslung launcher made from parts salvaged from a destroyed Pikeman mechanoid.
